name: Seva Sangam
briefDescription: •	since 2004 we provide alternative education for 450 school drop-out children through residential bridge camps - we always attempt to reintegrate them into regular school•	Promotion of hand embroidery program for 50 Lambada women as a alternative livelihood: women who previously engaged in destructive wood collection practices have been linked up with boutiques in Hyderabad which give them embroidery orders thus providing regular employment to the tribal women.•	Study of the impact of climate and hydrological change on livelihoods in the Manjeera river basin : 4800 families are involved in this program in which the interests and practices of farmers, fishermen, livestock owners and forest dwelling communities are elicited and analyzed. •	National Environmental Awareness Campaign (NEAC) has been conducted every year among 1050 farmers of 14 villages (until March 2011)•	Community based water tank management program covering 14 tanks: 3500 farmers and 1500 families have benefited from this program through improvements to the water storage and distribution infrastructure, more efficient irrigation patterns, more stable water availability throughout the year, increased fish yield. •	environmental educational program in schools, supported by the Andhra Pradesh National Green Corps initiative for students : we provide information, promote the formation of students-level cabinets, monitor knowledge and practices in 50 high schools for a total of over 9000 students; we focus on water, energy and land management, sanitation and agriculture•	School health education program in school for adolescent girls with a total coverage of 232 schools and 20,588 students.•	Andhra Pradesh study on alternative cropping strategies: coverage of five of the districts.•	Development and promotion of fuel efficient wood stoves in rural areas: to reduce wood consumption, prevent adverse effects on women’s and children’s health due chronic exposure to indoor air pollution; induce a positive impact on the forest and on carbon emissions.
